features: St. Ives Renewing Collagen & Elastin daily facial moisturizer conditions skin for a youthful glow
This face cream is made with 100% natural moisturizers and safflower seed oil
The safflowers used in this face lotion are harvested from trusted sources in countries like Argentina and Australia
Youthful skin is always in. This face moisturizer helps renew skin for a beautiful, healthy glow.
Our moisturizer is dermatologist tested, paraben free, non-comedogenic (not tending to cause blocked pores), and certified cruelty-free by PETA
body.description: St. Ives Renewing Collagen & Elastin Moisturizer is infused with hardworking collagen and elastin, for a hydrating formula that promotes a youthful glow. Give your skin a daily moisture boost with this facial moisturizer. Made with collagen, elastin and safflower oil, it's safe to use morning and night for smooth, hydrated skin. Now it's easier than ever to nourish your skin with the goodness of 100% natural moisturizers. A lesser known relative of the sunflower, the safflower is a plant with red, yellow and orange flowers. But you shouldn't be deceived by its prickly looking exterior; the plant's oil is known to help to smooth and moisturize skin. Our safflowers come from all over the world, including such countries as Australia and Argentina. The flowers we use are carefully picked and then put through a process which consists of soaking and refining to extract the oil, which is a 100% pure and natural moisturizer too. Youthful skin is always in! This face moisturizer helps renew skin for a beautiful, healthy glow. Collagen and elastin proteins are naturally present in healthy skin. Our nourishing face moisturizer helps you support your body's natural production of these building blocks. To use, apply paraben free face lotion to face and neck, morning and evening — and give your skin the TLC it deserves.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Give your skin a daily boost. St. Ives Renewing Collagen and Elastin Moisturizer combines the goodness of 100% natural safflower seed oil with collagen and elastin proteins to hydrate your skin and give it a smooth, youthful glow. This nourishing face moisturizer helps you support your body's natural production of collagen and elastin proteins.

100% Natural Moisturizers This everyday moisturizer is dermatologist tested, made with collagen and elastin proteins, and 100% natural safflower seed oil. A Boost of Science This daily moisturizer won’t clog pores. Cruelty-Free Globally, St. Ives does not test on animals and is Cruelty- Free by PETA. Nature Reset St. Ives wants to help you de-stress and get a boost of happy by spending more time with nature.

St. Ives Acne Control Apricot Face Scrub St. Ives Refreshing Rose Water and Aloe Vera Body Wash Cleanser St. Ives Collagen and Elastin Body Lotion Main Benefit St. Ives Acne Face Scrub deeply exfoliates and cleans pores for fresh, beautiful, glowing skin. Refresh your skin with 100% natural rose and aloe vera extracts. This moisturizing hand and body lotion with 100% natural moisturizers, helps restore, rejuvenate and soothe dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First Time Purchase: Good, solid moisturizer!
reviews.reviewText: This is the first time I've ever purchased a product by St. Ives (along with another product in the same package), and so far, I think that it's a good moisturizer and will continue to use until it's gone!It's a sizable product, with the the moisturizer's white cream filling to the top (nearly). It does have a noticeable scent/smell to it when you open it, which isn't unpleasant but it can be a bit much for some. The cream isn't too heavy/thick, but I noticed that you can use a little less and it still covers a good amount of skin area. After applying, I noticed that after about 15-20 minutes, the product gives a smooth feeling on the skin.I've used this for the past few days on my face, neck, hands and arms, and haven't seen any redness, itchiness, oiliness, or odd rashes. I have sensitive/dry skin, so this is a plus that my skin hasn't reacted negatively.Pros: Big tub of moisturizer for only $6-$7, leaves a smooth/soft feeling, cream isn't too heavy, can be used on body/face, no odd skin reactions (so far), and package came undamaged/affected.Cons: The scent might be too much for someone sensitive to smells (and it isn't my favorite) and there was no sealing/cover between the lid and the cream...which means anyone before you could've opened it.Overall, for only $6-$7, I'd give it a try to someone looking for a moisturizer that is affordable, sizable, and satisfactory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the St. Ives Collagen Moisturizer, and it has quickly become my go-to facial moisturizer. Here’s why I highly recommend it: 1. Affordable: One of the standout features of this moisturizer is its affordability. It provides excellent value for the price, making it accessible to everyone without compromising on quality. 2. Like Lotion for Your Face: The consistency of this moisturizer is reminiscent of a lightweight lotion, which makes it incredibly easy to apply. It glides smoothly onto the skin, absorbing quickly without leaving a greasy residue. 3. Great Under Makeup: I was thrilled to find that this moisturizer works perfectly as a base for makeup. It creates a smooth canvas for foundation and helps it glide on effortlessly. No more worrying about makeup caking or sliding off! 4. Softens and Nourishes: The St. Ives Collagen Moisturizer does an excellent job of softening the skin. With regular use, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture of my face. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and supple throughout the day. 5. Pleasant Scent and Sleep-Friendly: The moisturizer has a delightful fragrance that is not overpowering. I appreciate how it adds a subtle touch of freshness to my skincare routine. Additionally, its lightweight formula allows me to comfortably wear it overnight without any discomfort. 6. Generous Portion: The product comes in a generous portion, providing long-lasting use. You won’t need to repurchase frequently, making it a budget-friendly option. 7. No Bad Breakouts: I have sensitive skin, but this moisturizer didn’t cause any adverse reactions or breakouts. It’s gentle and suitable for various skin types, ensuring a positive experience for everyone.While I haven’t noticed immediate anti-aging effects comparable to some other brands, such as Olay, the St. Ives Collagen Moisturizer provides long-term benefits for the skin. Consistent use may reveal the collagen’s anti-aging effects gradually.In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend the St. Ives Collagen Moisturizer to everyone. It’s affordable, acts like a lotion for your face, works well under makeup, softens and nourishes the skin, has a pleasant scent, and can even be worn overnight. This product delivers on its promises without causing breakouts, making it a fantastic addition to your skincare routine. Give it a try, and you won’t be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far, seems to keep face moisturized throughout day, with slight clean scent. Price is nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very economical and perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and have been using this product for over three months now. Only a small amount is needed, and it smells great while leaving my skin feeling refreshed. I usually avoid products with strong odors because I'm afraid they might cause breakouts, but this product seems to be doing its job well. I love its quality and affordable price. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this on my face and hands. Both are soft after using it. The scent is also refreshing. It has a faint peach smell to me. It's not string at all in my opinion. I will be using this from now on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best products on the market. Most products don’t do what they say they will do, but this product exceeds expectations. It leaves my face hydrated and not greasy. It gives me a youthful look!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I swear by this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff! My mom and I have been using it since it was in the pink tubs with the red lids! We have both used it daily for 25+ years. For reference, in the picture (from 2022) I’m 39 years old and my mom is 62 years old. Both of us are only wearing basic untinted sunscreen and zero makeup.Sad that stores in the US are no longer carrying it. I realize that I have an advantage of really good skin genes from my mom, and the fact that I moisturize day and night, and I’m not outside all the time, but I still feel like this lotion has helped my skin a ton. I love the subtle scent (I think it’s gardenia?). I love that it’s lightweight, my skin feels hydrated without feeling suffocated.My skin is pretty dang sensitive, so when it’s minorly chapped, this lotion can sting a little but not enough for me to stop using it. Other than that, my skin loves this lotion.In the winter I have to use a little more because I live in the mountain west and it gets really dry here. But other than that, it’s pretty dang awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: To start: I’m a fan of this moisturizer, and I’ve done my research. It’s very affordable, has a lot of the same stuff that high-end brands have, etc…However, I was weirded out that when I opened it up and their was no sealer on top. Makes me think “this could be anything”. Not sure if the manufacturers make it that way, or that’s just how this came…That’s really my reason to lower the star rating. Without the the sealer lid it just seems suspect, no?!?Also, I used this (and have in the past) as a substitute Kiehl’s Ultra Moisturizing Cream. When something is 1/10 the price, you have to consider it. This is very close

Es una crema que mi mamá usa desde hace muchos años pero se ha vuelto difícil de encontrar, es de excelente calidad y mucho más barata que otras opciones en el mercado. Da buenos resultados sin tener que gastar de más, en cremas los resultados dependen de cada persona y no sabes como será para ti si no la pruebas, si aun no la has probado vale totalmente la pena hacerlo
Gentle. Really moisturizes and protects. Very effective! Not greasy. Non-irritating. Good ingredients. Good price, and generous amount! I have always like this brand!

reviews.reviewerName: Luis Alexander Oviedo ReguerosLuis Alexander Oviedo Regueros
reviews.reviewText: Llevo más de una semana usándola y me parece un excelente producto. Un olor suave, no es grasosa, no me produjo alergia, es sencilla y fácil de usar. Mi piel suele ser grasosa y al realizarme limpieza se empieza a escamar, pero usando cremas como esta, no se maltrata, no se nota y creo que cuidao adecuadamente mi piel. La seguiré comprando.
Très bonne texture. Parfait. Cela fait une semaine que je l’utilise. J’en suis satisfaite. J’attends de voir les résultats.

reviews.reviewTitle: Reichhaltige Creme für das ganze Jahr
reviews.reviewText: Diese reichhaltige Creme zieht schnell ein und macht eine gepflegte, zarte Haut. Der Duft ist ziemlich neutral und ich benutze sie Tag und Nacht. Sehr empfehlenswert
